snippet: Otago Highlanders winger Buxton Popoalii has been forced to retire from all rugby after heart surgery last week, his Super Rugby team said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Heart Problems Force Highlanders' Popoalii to Retire
headline.main: Heart Problems Force Highlanders' Popoalii to Retire

lead_paragraph: Otago Highlanders winger Buxton Popoalii has been forced to retire from all rugby after heart surgery last week, his Super Rugby team said on Thursday.
